00030 #include "prefixsettings.h"
00031 
00032 PrefixSettings::PrefixSettings(QString prefix_name, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034     // Setup base UI
00035     setupUi(this);
00036     
00037     // Setting class prefix name
00038     this->prefix_name=prefix_name;
00039     
00040     // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00041     libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00042 
00043     if (!libq4wine.load()){
00044         libq4wine.load();
00045     }
00046 
00047     // Getting corelib calss pointer
00048     CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00049     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(true);
00050 
00051     // Creating database classes
00052     db_prefix = new Prefix();
00053 
00054     this->loadThemeIcons(this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString());
00055 
00056     QStringList result = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(prefix_name);
00057     if (result.at(0) == "-1")
00058         return;
00059 
00060     prefix_id=result.at(0);
00061     
00062     txtWineLibs->setText(result.at(2));
00063     txtWineLoaderBin->setText(result.at(3));
00064     txtWineServerBin->setText(result.at(4));
00065     txtWineBin->setText(result.at(5));
00066 
00067     //comboDeviceList
00068     txtMountPoint->setText(result.at(6));
00069     
00070     if (prefix_name=="Default"){
00071         txtPrefixName->setEnabled(FALSE);
00072         txtPrefixPath->setEnabled(FALSE);
00073         cmdGetPrefixPath->setEnabled(FALSE);
00074     } else {
00075         cmdGetPrefixPath->installEventFilter(this); 
00076     }
00077     
00078     txtPrefixName->setText(prefix_name);
00079     txtPrefixPath->setText(result.at(1));
00080 
00081     comboDeviceList->addItems(CoreLib->getCdromDevices());
00082     comboDeviceList->setCurrentIndex (comboDeviceList->findText(result.at(7)));
00083 
00084     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_Click()));
00085     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00086     
00087     cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00088     cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00089     cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00090     cmdGetWineLibs->installEventFilter(this);
00091     
00092     cmdGetMountPoint->installEventFilter(this);
00093     
00094     return;
00095 }

00098 
00099 void PrefixSettings::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00100     QPixmap pixmap;
00101                 
00102     if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/exec.png").arg(themePath))){
00103         pixmap.load(":data/exec.png");
00104     }
00105                 
00106     lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00107         
00108     cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00109     cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00110     cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00111     cmdGetWineLibs->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00112 
00113     cmdGetMountPoint->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00114     cmdGetPrefixPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00115         
00116     return;
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 QIcon PrefixSettings::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00121     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00122     // If it fails -> load default from resource file
00123     
00124     QIcon icon;
00125     
00126     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00127         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00128         if (icon.isNull()){
00129             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00130         }
00131     } else {
00132         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00133     }
00134 
00135     return icon;    
00136 }
00137 
00138 void PrefixSettings::cmdCancel_Click(){
00139     reject();
00140     return; 
00141 }
00142 
00143 void PrefixSettings::cmdOk_Click(){
00144     if (txtPrefixName->text().isEmpty()){
00145          QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Please, enter prefix name"));
00146           return;
00147     }
00148 
00149     if (prefix_name!=txtPrefixName->text()){
00150         if (db_prefix->isExistsByName(txtPrefixName->text())){
00151             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but prefix named %1 already exists.").arg(txtPrefixName->text()));
00152             return;
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156     QSqlQuery query;
00157     query.prepare("UPDATE prefix SET wine_dllpath=:wine_dllpath, wine_loader=:wine_loader, wine_server=:wine_server, wine_exec=:wine_exec, cdrom_mount=:cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive=:cdrom_drive, name=:name, path=:path WHERE id=:id;");
00158     query.bindValue(":wine_dllpath", txtWineLibs->text());
00159     query.bindValue(":wine_loader", txtWineLoaderBin->text());
00160     query.bindValue(":wine_server", txtWineServerBin->text());
00161     query.bindValue(":wine_exec", txtWineBin->text());
00162 
00163     if (txtMountPoint->text().endsWith ("/"))
00164         txtMountPoint->setText(txtMountPoint->text().mid(0, txtMountPoint->text().length()-1));
00165 
00166     query.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", txtMountPoint->text());
00167     if (comboDeviceList->currentText()!=tr("<none>")){
00168         query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", comboDeviceList->currentText());
00169     } else {
00170         query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00171     }
00172     query.bindValue(":name", txtPrefixName->text());
00173     query.bindValue(":path", txtPrefixPath->text());
00174     query.bindValue(":id", prefix_id);
00175     
00176     if (!db_prefix->updateQuery(&query)){
00177         query.clear();
00178         reject();
00179     }
00180 
00181     query.clear();
00182     accept();
00183     return;
00184 }
00185 
00186 bool PrefixSettings::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event){
00187     /*
00188      * Select folder dialog
00189      */
00190 
00191     if (event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress) {
00192         
00193         QString file;
00194         
00195         if (obj->objectName().right(3)=="Bin"){
00196             file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open File"), QDir::homePath(),   "All files (*.*)");
00197         } else {
00198             file = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Open Directory"), QDir::homePath(),   QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks);
00199         }
00200             
00201         if (!file.isEmpty()){
00202             QString a;
00203             
00204             a.append("txt");
00205             a.append(obj->objectName().right(obj->objectName().length()-6));
00206             
00207             QLineEdit *lineEdit = findChild<QLineEdit *>(a);
00208             
00209             if (lineEdit){
00210                 lineEdit->setText(file);
00211             } else {
00212                 qDebug("Error");    
00213             }
00214         }
00215     }
00216     
00217     return FALSE;   
00218 }
